pages.text: $(li)$(l:https://discord.gg/BFT4d5HeFXl)Offical Create discord server$(/l). Here you can learn all kinds of information. It is a place to ask questions and help you troubleshoot your builds.$(li)I was blown away when I first saw this video! $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rR8W-f9YhYA)This is Create$(/l)

Both $(l:https://www.youtube.com/c/rockit14)Rockit14$(/l) and $(l:https://www.youtube.com/c/polartt)Polartt$(/l) have wonderful YouTube videos featuring Create. Their videos are very informative and to the point and don't waste a lot of time. Their examples are easy to follow. I highly recommend. Many of the videos are for older versions of create, so be sure to watch the videos showing the updates!
